Emerson 2018 Annual Report

Code, UX

View Project

We went through many revisions until we landed on this concept. It was originally based on the print piece for the annual report, but I helped with prototyping and concepting some of the interactive elements of the report. We used SVG's to handle some of the complex interactive graphics.
